Moparisthebest:

It isn’t totally without use, my server status checker is written in java, and I do this to detect if people have multiple domains pointing to the same IP and ban them. It works great.

item.title: Cheaking host name IP
item.dc:creator: @_ikram _ikram
item.description:
@_ikram wrote:

Well, i thought this would be good for this community, as there is a rule for No multiple account Lol, anyway…
This little application enables you to lookup hostname’s. The corresponding IP will be displayed.

// file name IpCheck.java

public class IpCheck {public static void main(String[] args)throws java.net.UnknownHostException { String yourURL = "localhost";/* System.out.println("Name / Ip adress: " + java.net.InetAddress.getByName(args[1])); */System.out.println("Name / Ip adress: " + java.net.InetAddress.getByName(yourURL)); } }

Read full topic
